description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cpp1c","text":"This protocols describes the use of Skim Milk Flocculation to concentrate and extract SARS-CoV-2 from Moore swab wastewater samples. Included in this protocol are: materials and equipment, steps for processing Moore swabs, and steps for concentrating and extracting the virus using the Qiagen RNeasy Mini Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Rollins School of Public Health, Emory University

keywords: skim milk flocculation, wastewater, SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19, Moore swab
